publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: He wished to set up principles for people

sense.def: administrative rules

seg.line: 而謂群下才智莫能出其上。

tls:text.tls:line: P'ang Chen,169 Great administrator og Chiu-chiang,

sense.def: governor of a contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:line: as when he disturbed the proper order of ranking

sense.def: favoured concubine

tls:text.tls:line: and do not dare to go to the rescue.'

sense.def: go to V

tls:text.tls:line: All that the sages and worthies have transmitted

sense.def: sages and worthies; sage men of worth

tls:text.tls:line: The genius of the sages and worthies does not show itself in this age,335

sense.def: of the sages and worthies

tls:text.tls:line: people were born with beauty and wealth.

sense.def: certain individuals; human individuals; person (as having it's own features)
may be properly compared with, be comparable to the case of (typically but not always with understood subject)

seg.line: 譬如渴而操杯器，就江海飲，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬如渴而操杯器，就江海飲，

sense.def: 譬如為山"It is like building up a mound": It is like V-ing
be like the cases of the sentences SS

tls:text.tls:line: The Ch'in chancellor1 Ly Pu-wei encouraged his noble and excellent scholars

sense.def: invite N to V

tls:text.tls:line: The Ch'in chancellor1 Ly Pu-wei encouraged his noble and excellent scholars

sense.def: welcome N to V

tls:text.tls:line: The Ch'in chancellor1 Ly Pu-wei encouraged his noble and excellent scholars

sense.def: elevated and exquisitely talented (men)

seg.line: 漢之淮南王聘天下辯通，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 漢之淮南王聘天下辯通，
tls:text.tls:line: The King of Huai-nan [Liu An] of the Han dynasty enticed his brilliant and penetrating scholars

sense.def: 今之孝者 "of the present time those who are filial-minded" NP1 indicates the placing in time of NP2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 漢之淮南王聘天下辯通，
tls:text.tls:line: The King of Huai-nan [Liu An] of the Han dynasty enticed his brilliant and penetrating scholars

sense.def: discriminating and knowledgeable persons

tls:text.tls:line: to write sections and chapters [of the book Huai-nan-tzu].

sense.def: commit to writing; 著所聞 "write down what one has heard"; to compose in writing; compose a record of, celebrate in writing

tls:text.tls:line: to write sections and chapters [of the book Huai-nan-tzu].

sense.def: chapters and sections, components of a book

tls:text.tls:line: When they were finished,2
When they were finished,2

sense.def: be completely realised

tls:text.tls:line: both books were put on display at the market place in the capital,

sense.def: show N1 in N2

tls:text.tls:line: and a reward of one thousand catties of gold was publicly offered

sense.def: offer N1 to people

tls:text.tls:line: to attract scholars to criticize the books.

sense.def: Invite N2 to see the contextually determinate N1

tls:text.tls:line: Nevertheless, no one was able to propose any change.

sense.def: nothing within the range of the TOPIC; no one within the range indicated by the TOPIC

tls:text.tls:line: Their contents were concise and captivating,

sense.def: be concise, be short; be constrained

tls:text.tls:line: Their contents were concise and captivating,

sense.def: be alluring; be attractive to look at or to read
essential substance, central point, essence (often contrasted to 用 'function' in the Buddhist context)
be supplied; be provided
words; discourse; sentence; doctrine as expressed in words
be subtle

tls:text.tls:line: Tung Chung-shu concentrated all his spirit on handing down the past.

sense.def: transmit (a tradition), aiming for deep understanding

tls:text.tls:line: Tung Chung-shu concentrated all his spirit on handing down the past.

sense.def: what is ancient: matters of antiquity, ancient affairs

tls:text.tls:line: Tung Chung-shu concentrated all his spirit on handing down the past.

sense.def: cause N1 to concentrate on N2

tls:text.tls:line: I have written the New Treatise

sense.def: first person pronoun by which the author of a work refers to himself as the author of that work.

tls:text.tls:line: I have written the New Treatise

sense.def: produce> e.g. 為此詩者 "he who has written/composed this song" write; work on writing; compose

tls:text.tls:line: in order to examine and discuss the past and the present,

sense.def: methodically，systematically, using a definite technique

tls:text.tls:line: in order to examine and discuss the past and the present,

sense.def: ＝辯discuss, typically on the basis of logical/sophistic/rhetorically well-formed arguments

tls:text.tls:line: but I also wish to promote successful government.

sense.def: cause to develop postitively, promote; cause to flourish; bring to fruition

tls:text.tls:line: but I also wish to promote successful government.

sense.def: good government; governing; matters of proper government

tls:text.tls:line: but I also wish to promote successful government.

sense.def: but also, nonetheless also, still 雖N亦V "even N will still v"

tls:text.tls:line: but I also wish to promote successful government.

sense.def: 我無是也“I do not have such": "it may be said that, it is a fact that": marks a judgemental non-narrative verbal sentence, often as being basic

tls:text.tls:line: How does this differ from the praise and blame given in the Ch'un ch'iu!

sense.def: how? in what way?

tls:text.tls:line: How does this differ from the praise and blame given in the Ch'un ch'iu!

sense.def: praise

tls:text.tls:line: How does this differ from the praise and blame given in the Ch'un ch'iu!

sense.def: moral criticism

tls:text.tls:line: How does this differ from the praise and blame given in the Ch'un ch'iu!

sense.def: be different from N

tls:text.tls:line: There are now people who doubt everything.

sense.def: at this point in time, nowadays, these days

tls:text.tls:line: There are now people who doubt everything.

sense.def: skeptics, doubters; quibblers

tls:text.tls:line: Before he reached the age of sixty

sense.def: in age, by years of age 年老 "old in age"

tls:text.tls:line: Before he reached the age of sixty

sense.def: exceeding/more than so-and-so many

tls:text.tls:line: Before he reached the age of sixty

sense.def: more than N
